basics.name: Charles Rhon Rafael
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Currently a Junior in the Computer Engineering Major at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate Fall 2019.

work.summary: Grader for EE 160 (Intro to Programming for Engineers)

volunteer.organization: UH Manoa Transpiler Project - Shaka Scheme
volunteer.summary: WEorked with a team to develop the UH Manoa Transpiler, Shaka Scheme
highlights: Create a Scheme interpreter following the rules outlined in R7RS.
Worked in the Parsings I/O team
Developed the code using C++, GitHub, and GoogleTest.

volunteer.summary: Worked with a team to build and design an autonomous mouse that could traverse though a maze.
highlights: Worked mainly on the software side (algorithms and movement).
Developed the code using MPLAB X, used a Pickit3 with a PIC Microcontroller, DC Stepper Motor, and IR Sensors.

volunteer.summary: Set up and run events such as Worship Service livestreams, musical activies, and community activities
highlights: Experience with A/V, Networking, and Streaming via OBS and Webex

volunteer.summary: Developed a website using Meteor and Semantic UI React for UH students to share and view recipes with others
highlights: Main role dealt with data creation and manipulation via MongoDB
It was a Issue-Driven Project, where we separated the work between team members and used Github to manage and organize
Final Project for Software Development class

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
